calculations.name: QTD
calculations.formula:
[Order Date]<=[Dynamic years] AND 
DATEPART('quarter',[Order Date])=DATEPART('quarter',[Dynamic years]) AND 
YEAR([Order Date])=YEAR([Dynamic years])

calculations.name: MTD
calculations.formula:
[Order Date]<=[Parameters].[Select date] AND 
DATEPART('month',[Order Date])=DATEPART('month',[Parameters].[Select date]) AND 
YEAR([Order Date])=YEAR([Parameters].[Select date])

calculations.name: Dynamic Measure values with YTD/MTD/QTD
calculations.formula:
CASE [Parameters].[Select Period]
WHEN 1 THEN [Order Date]<=[Parameters].[Select date]  and
[Order Date]>=(IF
MONTH([Parameters].[Select date])<=3
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Parameters].[Select date])-1,4,1)
ELSEIF MONTH([Parameters].[Select date])>=4 and  year([Parameters].[Select date])=(YEAR([Order Date]))
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Parameters].[Select date]),4,1) END)

WHEN 2 THEN [MTD]
WHEN 3 THEN [QTD]
END

[Order Date]>=(IF
MONTH([Select date])<=3
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Select date])-1,4,1)
ELSEIF MONTH([Select date])>=4 and  year([Select date])=(YEAR([Order Date]))
then MAKEDATE(YEAR([Select date]),4,1) END)*/
